Articles.Content:
This story is **CANCELED**

I can't continue this story because of a few reasons:

The save is corrupted

I did stuff mostly chaotic without planning before

It stopped being fun some time ago

The general story is kinda incoherent

There are lots of career mods I haven't used from the beginning, and I really want to try them

I get lots of lag (but 1.1 will hopefully solve that though)

But, I will make a new story, in 1.1, from the beginning of the career, with more mods, and less planned stuff. (like the debris attack)

I think I will delete the images because they are cluttering my Imgur account.

 [Chapter 1](http://imgur.com/a/JZEOY)

 [Chapter 2](https://imgur.com/a/S21Ci#0)

 [Interlude 1](https://imgur.com/a/GqkLh#0)

 [Chapter 3](https://imgur.com/a/jAgs8#0)

 Bob was chosen to walk first on the Mun, because he was an scientist and would yield more science.

 ![3vHZN7N.png](http://i.imgur.com/3vHZN7N.png)

 ![7hPKIZ4.png](http://i.imgur.com/7hPKIZ4.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-18T19:22:26Z" title="11/18/2015 07:22  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 18, 2015</time> by Thegamer211**

Ha, good use/abuse of reaction wheels, Bob! And very honored to see another author following (mostly ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) ) the official-but-unpublished Kerbfleet Graphic Novel Style Guide ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Keep it up, Gamer!

Thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Page 3 is ready by the way

![RSZsKy1.png](http://i.imgur.com/RSZsKy1.png)

After I got enough science, I started building. 

I wanted the cheapest way possible. That is what involved the 160 science node

![hI9h9hR.png](http://i.imgur.com/hI9h9hR.png)

![G079mEs.png](http://i.imgur.com/G079mEs.png)

Stay tuned for page 6&7!
all I can say is lol! Best comic ever! In humor, anyway

I managed to finish chapter one!

![3yv003t.png](http://i.imgur.com/3yv003t.png)

![RdPu1Ze.png](http://i.imgur.com/RdPu1Ze.png)

Chapter one completed.

Bob is spending his time in the R&D buildings.

Very impressive! Good job getting Bob home!

How long did it take to roll to another biome with the crashed lander?

- - - Updated - - -

And also, WELCOME to the forum!

A few minutes. 

:3 I was lurking the forum since long time ago, and decided to make an account.

You guys are great! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Chapter two started!

I used the mk1-2 module because after I installed tourism plus, and two of the old tourism contract kerbals remained.

![YfhfSOv.png](http://i.imgur.com/YfhfSOv.png)

![Yrx0IeQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/Yrx0IeQ.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-08T10:38:56Z" title="08/08/2015 10:38  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 8, 2015</time> by Thegamer211**
Hard to stop once you get going, isn't it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
This is cool. Nice inspiration of Kerbfleet comics. **Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Rep'd.**

> 
> Hard to stop once you get going, isn't it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Yup! 

Page 3, 4 and 5 are ready by the way! 

![SY4d31s.png](http://i.imgur.com/SY4d31s.png)

![PPlZ5hW.png](http://i.imgur.com/PPlZ5hW.png)

![ypGFbx8.png](http://i.imgur.com/ypGFbx8.png)

Kerbal space program, the place where wacky designs work.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I also installed infernal robotics now.

Few more pages done!

![hzZPuMe.png](http://i.imgur.com/hzZPuMe.png)

![BlG0E8L.png](https://i.imgur.com/BlG0E8L.png)

![W6J4wyb.png](http://i.imgur.com/W6J4wyb.png)

![8wFBZbk.png](http://i.imgur.com/8wFBZbk.png)

![3qkJ2PO.png](http://i.imgur.com/3qkJ2PO.png)

![RBIBA6h.png](http://i.imgur.com/RBIBA6h.png)

"Only Jeb is badS enough to land on water?" *Whaat?* Come on, Val, steal a plane and make Gene eat that green word balloon! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Hehehe, "No one saw that" due to staging the launch clamps before the rockets. Been there quite a few times ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

> 
> "Only Jeb is badS enough to land on water?" *Whaat?* Come on, Val, steal a plane and **make Gene eat that green word balloon!** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I laughed for an few good minutes after reading that. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I finally started to get anomaly surveyor contracts ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

Also, deployed landing gears can also work as low tech A.I.R.B.R.A.K.E.S. Who knew? 

![ouGMQuZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/ouGMQuZ.png)

![UWpsRaC.png](http://i.imgur.com/UWpsRaC.png)

![4UVHcro.png](http://i.imgur.com/4UVHcro.png)

![znACumG.png](http://i.imgur.com/znACumG.png)

![EHDBp9O.png](http://i.imgur.com/EHDBp9O.png)

![i54yl6T.png](http://i.imgur.com/i54yl6T.png)

![1sm1KoB.png](http://i.imgur.com/1sm1KoB.png)

Sorry for not submitting for two days, my friends made an DMP server and I played some time.

EDIT: I got jeb upside down by changing to orbital camera mode.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-12T21:04:33Z" title="08/12/2015 09:04  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 12, 2015</time> by Thegamer211**
  
Jeb is upside down in the last image

The last few pages of chapter two. 

Before I hired Sherby, I tried a few rescue contracts. Don't gamble kids, especially with kerbal's lifes!

![IklE51W.png](http://i.imgur.com/IklE51W.png)

![FnVwVzR.png](http://i.imgur.com/FnVwVzR.png)

![6ufOKT0.png](http://i.imgur.com/6ufOKT0.png)

![dyWQREv.png](http://i.imgur.com/dyWQREv.png)

Nailed it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) This is getting better and better--your Kerbals are developing distinct personalities and so is your personal 'kerbalverse'. Keep it up!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-14T12:52:46Z" title="08/14/2015 12:52  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 14, 2015</time> by Kuzzter**

I find this particular style of graphic mission report very entertaining and funny. It seems honest in its simplicity. 

Well Done! Rep to you!

Meanwhile at the KSC...

![BVqQCdO.png](http://i.imgur.com/BVqQCdO.png)

![OxET73X.png](http://i.imgur.com/OxET73X.png)

![3xaS5WY.png](http://i.imgur.com/3xaS5WY.png)

![AU45mE5.png](http://i.imgur.com/AU45mE5.png)

![WGHEF3T.png](http://i.imgur.com/WGHEF3T.png)

...Jeb remembers the past, and Val gets courage.

Just to clarifiy, the noise Val was making was she stealing the craft.![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

The orange suits have a picnic!

![F5By87w.png](http://i.imgur.com/F5By87w.png)

![t7k54Jv.png](http://i.imgur.com/t7k54Jv.png)

![mnDvM9R.png](http://i.imgur.com/mnDvM9R.png)

Even eating food causes explosions. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Kubesats, 3 missions at a time!

![4aFOgHQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/4aFOgHQ.png)

![LKreqXu.png](http://i.imgur.com/LKreqXu.png)

The team is ready for the Minmus mission.

Edited the image.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-17T07:02:56Z" title="08/17/2015 07:02  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 17, 2015</time> by Thegamer211**

> 
> Even eating food causes explosions. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Well of course it does ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Happy to see some Sunday comix! Kuzzter's CTRL-V finger needs a rest.
What mod is it that adds the level and profession in your crew portraits?? I've seen it around, can't quite seem to find it......

> 
> What mod is it that adds the level and profession in your crew portraits?? I've seen it around, can't quite seem to find it......

It's called portrait stats on ckan.
